alternate.name: Gaial Ryusei Dragon, Star Dragon King

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Super Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "Speed Attacker". Your opponent"s psychic creatures can"t attack or block. Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, put a psychic creature that has that card"s cost or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Triple breaker Link Release

card.name: Joan of Arc, Goddess of Victory

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, whenever this creature attacks or whenever this creature blocks, you may choose up to 2 of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Double breaker Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone for the ability of a fire creature or spell, he can"t choose this one.

card.name: Super Spell Great Blue, the Blue Tide

property.name: Race
property.value: Poseidia Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. If it"s a spell, you may cast it for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Gaia Command/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature from your hand into the battle zone. Triple breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Command/Flame Command/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) If you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "Shield Trigger". If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +4000 power and "Double breaker". If you have 7 or more water and/or fire [[card]]s in your mana zone, this creature gets "Whenever this creature breaks a shield, put it on top of its owner"s deck."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature or another creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone. If you do, those two creatures battle. Double breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Command/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire or nature creatures. Meteorburn - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, draw 3 cards. Double breaker At the start of your turn, you may put a non-evolution creature from your hand under this creature.

property.name: Race

card.name: Invincible Operation, Grand General of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your 'Roar of Jack, Commander of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron' wins a battle, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 'Roar of Jack, Commander of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron' in the battle zone, choose 3 of your opponent"s shields and put them into their owner"s graveyard. Hunting Triple breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water or darkness creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, choose a non-evolution creature and put it under this creature. Then, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, put all non-evolution creatures under it into the battle zone.
